name: Scribd
headline: World's largest online library.
description:
Scribd gives you access to millions of ebooks, audiobooks, magazines, podcasts, and more — all in one place, for one price.

OUR VISION
Inspire the world through stories and knowledge.

OUR MISSION
Build the largest and most accessible library connecting storytellers with their audience.

If you love working with smart, motivated people, you’ll love working at Scribd. We value our employees, we demonstrate accountability, and we take action. We’re one team with a common goal: helping our customers flourish.
generated_description:
Scribd is shaping up to be the world's largest online library, with a clear mission: to connect storytellers with their audience while making knowledge easily accessible. Founded back in 2007 and rolling out of Y Combinator’s Batch S06, it began its journey focusing on a diverse collection of digital content, including millions of ebooks, audiobooks, magazines, and much more—all bundled into a single subscription service.

Scribd's **vision** is straightforward yet ambitious: to inspire the world through stories and knowledge. The vision reflects the company's understanding of the power of narrative and information to change lives and perceptions. With over 195 million documents at users' fingertips, ranging from academic papers to personal growth guides, Scribd has become a significant player in both the education technology (edtech) and digital content arenas.

Headquartered in San Francisco, with a team of around 300 smart, motivated employees, Scribd clearly values collaboration and accountability. Their workplace culture encourages innovation and teamwork, ultimately driving their mission to help customers flourish. Each team member contributes toward Scribd being a hub for learning and artistic expression.

Their offerings span a wide array of categories, including academic disciplines, culture, hobbies, and professional resources, all aimed at empowering users to find specialized knowledge on almost any topic. The company acknowledges its innovative edge by recently integrating AI-enhanced learning, making the browsing and discovery experience much richer.

For anyone who’s curious about joining their journey, Scribd frequently highlights their commitment to a supportive work environment—meaning if you love working with passionate people, Scribd is worth considering. 

You can dive deeper into their offerings or even subscribe to their service at [scribd.com](http://scribd.com). Whether you’re looking for information to complete a project, wanting to immerse yourself in a gripping story, or seeking to level up your skills, Scribd has tailored solutions to fit those needs.
